a.title: What you need to know to attend NACS

div.a: What you need to know to attend NACS

nav.div: Northwest Allen County Schools » News » What's New » NACS Extended School Closure Announcement

div.div:
Northwest Allen County Schools recognizes the gravity of the decision to convert learning to take place remotely versus at school, and it was not made lightly. The health and safety of everyone in our school communities and at-large are important to NACS.
NACS announces extended closure due to COVID-19 20190313.pdf
